New Afrika Shrine bụ ebe ụlọ ogege ntụrụndụ na-emeghe ikuku dị na Ikeja, Lagos State

Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ebe a na-eme emume egwu Felabration kwa afọ. N'ịbụ nke Femi Kuti (nwa mbụ nke Fela Kuti) na Yeni Anikulapo-Kuti na-achịkwa ugbu a, ọ bụ ihe nọchiri anya Africa Shrine ochie nke Fela Kuti mepụtara na 1970 ruo mgbe a gbara ya ọkụ na 1977. New Afrika Shrine na-egosi foto foto nke Fela na egwu egwu nke Femi Kuti na Seun Kuti si otú a mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta.
Na ọnwa Julaị ubochi nke atọ nke afọ, 2018, Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron gara Shrine ma malite Oge Ọdịbendị Afrịka 2020 na France. Macron kwuru na ọ gara Shrine dị ka nwa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2002.
